p: Corrigendum to Decision No 1/2018 of the ECAA Joint Committee of 3 May 2018 with regard to the adoption of its rules of procedure 2019/1802
(Official Journal of the European Union L 274 of 28 October 2019)

quotedStructure.p: '(*) This designation is without prejudice to positions on status, and is in line with UNSCR 1244/1999 and the ICJ Opinion on the Kosovo declaration of independence.',
'(*) Pursuant to UN Security Council Resolution 1244 of 10 June 1999.'
